Container.Name: Macinabox2
Container.Overview:
This container can download macOS either Catalina, Mojave or HighSierra. It will download the install media from Apple servers and convert it to a usable format for use for a VM. It will also create the correct XML for the VM along with the corresponding icon. It can be run in 2 ways as a full install (easiest) which will set up everything or preparation install which will prepare all the files and put them in the AppData folder under macinabox.
Usage
Install VM --full will download MacOS and install needed files into your VM location. (requires the array to the stopped and started after the container is run for VM to show in the VM list) --prepare will download MacOS and put all needed files into AppData ready for manual use.
macOS version Choose version from below --mojave --high-sierra --catalina
Vm image Location of your vm share ( defualt /mnt/user/domains/ )
TYPE choose type od vdisk qcow2 or raw
vdisksize the size you want your vdisk to be created
Container.DonateText: If you like this then please consider buying me a beer!! :D
Container.Description:
This container can download macOS either Catalina, Mojave or HighSierra. It will download the install media from Apple servers and convert it to a usable format for use for a VM. It will also create the correct XML for the VM along with the corresponding icon. It can be run in 2 ways as a full install (easiest) which will set up everything or preparation install which will prepare all the files and put them in the AppData folder under macinabox.
Usage
Install VM --full will download MacOS and install needed files into your VM location. (requires the array to the stopped and started after the container is run for VM to show in the VM list) --prepare will download MacOS and put all needed files into AppData ready for manual use.
macOS version Choose version from below --mojave --high-sierra --catalina

Config.Name: Operating System Version
Config.Description: Choose macOS version to install

Config.Name: VM Images Location
Config.Description: VM share. Used only by auto install (if your vm share is not default /mnt/user/domains auto install will not work.)

Config.Name: Install Type
Config.Description: Manual Install (preferred as more control) or Auto install will install basic macOS VM

Config.Name: Vdisk Size
Config.Description: Enter desired vdisk size (only used by auto install - ignored by manual install)

Config.Name: Run Mode
Config.Description: choose running mode

Config.Name: Download Script
Config.Description: 2 different scripts to get macos. Change if one doesnt work for you

Config.Name: Isos Share Location
Config.Description: Your isos share path - macOS install and opencore bootloader will be put here. (used by auto and manual install)

Config.Name: Macinabox only data
Config.Description: Macinabox data as a subfolder of the main appdata

Config.Name: Basesystem
Config.Description: Baseimage temporary location as a subfolder of appdata

Config.Name: appdata
Config.Description: If you change this location be sure to change Macinabox only data & Baseimage location too.

Config.Name: USER_ID
Config.Description: Container Variable: USER_ID

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: Container Variable: UMASK

Config.Name: GROUP_ID
Config.Description: Container Variable: GROUP_ID

Config.Name: KEEP_APP_RUNNING
Config.Description: Dont change !!

Config.Name: Display Height
Config.Description: Height (in pixels) of the virtmager's window.

Config.Name: Display Width
Config.Description: Width (in pixels) of the virtmanager's window.

Config.Name: /dev/urandom
Config.Description: Dont change !!

Config.Name: webvnc
Config.Description: Virtmanager webvnc port

Config.Name: vnc
Config.Description: Virtmanger vnc port (if you want to use external vnc viewer programme)

Config.Name: XML location
Config.Description: Dont change !!
